text:
Jof Davies has deep hands-on expertise managing and deploying audiovisual and IT hardware in production environments.

Hardware experience includes:
- Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Cameras and associated rigs.
- Sony and Panasonic professional camcorder lines.
- Tripods, sliders, lighting rigs, and audio capture devices.
- ATEM switchers, SDI/HDMI converters, NDI encoders.
- Wireless systems from Hollyland, Teradek, LiveU, and Vaxis.
- QNAP NAS systems, VLAN setups, and cross-site sync environments.
- Windows and macOS systems for production and engineering work.

This hardware capability underpins Jof's ability to build stable, scalable production systems.
